import React, {Component} from 'react' class CurrentlyReading extends Component{ render(){ const {books} = this.props const currentlyReading= books.filter((book)=>(book.shelf.toLowerCase()==="currentlyreading")) return (

Currently Reading

    {currentlyReading.map((book)=>(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } } export default CurrentlyReading
